about_the_game:
This is no ordinary Sokoban Puzzle.
Play Twice offers a double the fun twist on the classic puzzle!

First, enjoy the challenge of moving the yellow blocks to press the yellow buttons. Brown boxes can be pushed to clear your path and solve the puzzle. Clear the stage, and you’re done... or are you?



Here’s where it gets interesting.
The same board begins a new challenge: this time, guide the red blocks to press the red buttons!



Success isn’t just about clearing the first playthrough—it’s about planning ahead for the second. Strategic thinking and careful moves are the keys to mastering this upgraded, deeply engaging Sokoban experience.

Get ready to play twice and enjoy the fun, twice over!

About the Demo Version

The demo version will be disabled once the full version is released.
If you would like to try the demo, make sure to play it before the release of the full version!

About Video Posts/Streaming

We generally welcome them. Please check the guidelines by clicking "View the manual" on the right.
detailed_description:
This is no ordinary Sokoban Puzzle.
Play Twice offers a double the fun twist on the classic puzzle!

First, enjoy the challenge of moving the yellow blocks to press the yellow buttons. Brown boxes can be pushed to clear your path and solve the puzzle. Clear the stage, and you’re done... or are you?



Here’s where it gets interesting.
The same board begins a new challenge: this time, guide the red blocks to press the red buttons!



Success isn’t just about clearing the first playthrough—it’s about planning ahead for the second. Strategic thinking and careful moves are the keys to mastering this upgraded, deeply engaging Sokoban experience.

Get ready to play twice and enjoy the fun, twice over!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Apple M1+ or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 170 MB available space

name: Play Twice Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window10+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Introducing Play Twice, a Sokoban puzzle with a twist. Clear a stage, and tackle the same map again with a new setup, requiring strategy from the first playthrough to succeed in the second. Enjoy a puzzle experience designed to let you truly “Play Twice”!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Indonesian, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Icelandic, Irish, Azerbaijani, Assamese, Afrikaans, Amharic, Albanian, Armenian, Igbo, Uyghur, Welsh, Wolof, Uzbek, Urdu, Estonian, Odia, Kazakh, Catalan, Kannada, Galician, K'iche', Kyrgyz, Khmer, Croatian, Gujarati, Quechua, Xhosa, Konkani, Sindhi, Sinhala, Georgian, Scots, Slovak, Slovenian, Swahili, Zulu, Serbian, Sotho, Sorani, Tajik, Tatar, Tamil, Dari, Cherokee, Tswana, Tigrinya, Telugu, Turkmen, Nepali, Hausa, Basque, Valencian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Hindi, Filipino, Hebrew, Belarusian, Bangla, Persian, Bosnian, Maori, Macedonian, Malayalam, Marathi, Maltese, Malay, Mongolian, Yoruba, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Kinyarwanda
